metadata.title: CVE-2023-3966 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Open vSwitch where multiple versions are vulnerable tocrafted Geneve packets, which may result in a denial of service and invalidmemory accesses. Triggering this issue requires that hardware offloadingvia the netlink path is enabled.

criterions.comment: openvswitch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
